thread.title: Connected Vehicle Pilot Deployment Program

title: Connected Vehicle Pilot Deployment Program
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Connected Vehicle Pilot Deployment Program Text Size: Connected Vehicle Pilot Deployment Program http://www.its.dot.gov/factsheets/pdf/JPO_CVPilot.pdf 173364 Connected Vehicle Pilot Deployment Program The U.S. Department of Transportation’s Office of the Assistant Secretary for Research and Technology has released a summary of its connected vehicle pilot deployment program—a program that aims to enable safe, interoperable, networked wireless communications among vehicles, infrastructure, and personal communications devices. This Summary Last Modified On: 10/21/2015 The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine 500 Fifth Street, NW | Washington, DC 20001 | T: 202.334.2000 Copyright © 2015 National Academy of Sciences.
